SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORT

Account ID: ACC_0001

PART 1: TRANSACTION DETAILS
On 2025-12-04, a credit of USD 6,666.97 was executed via ACH. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_15242).
On 2025-12-06, a credit of USD 905.44 was executed via wire. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_62103). Alert reason: high_risk_country

On 2025-12-07, a credit of EUR 1,936.48 was executed via cash. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_81011).
On 2025-12-14, a debit of EUR 1,304.96 was executed via crypto. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_81637). Alert reason: high_risk_country
On 2025-12-20, a credit of GBP 2,113.51 was executed via ACH. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_46339). Alert reason: high_risk_country
On 2025-12-23, a credit of EUR 401.12 was executed via card. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_43511).
On 2025-12-26, a debit of EUR 2,737.74 was executed via crypto. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_74499).
On 2025-12-26, a credit of GBP 201.77 was executed via wire. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_99304).
On 2025-12-26, a credit of USD 1,868.69 was executed via ACH. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_8943). Alert reason: high_risk_country

PART 2: ACCOUNT SUMMARY
During the reporting period, total debits amounted to 4,726.02 and total credits amounted to 14,093.98. There were 3 debit transactions and 7 credit transactions. Unique creditors: 3; unique debtors: 5. Transactions observed: ACH, card, cash, crypto, wire.
